metadata.dc:title: Suppression of the hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal axis due to chronic topical corticoid therapy. Report of two cases
metadata.dc:description: We present 2 patients with adrenal insufficiency due to incorrect prolonged use of topical corticoid therapy for psoriasis. The prolonged topical corticoid therapy suppressed the hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal axis. We discuss the mechanisms and risk factors that may lead to hypothalamic-pituitary-adrenal suppression
